description: this is dashboard for marzban pannel with mysql

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(id) 'Online Users', online_at FROM users WHERE online_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 SECOND) GROUP BY online_at;

SELECT 
    nodes.node,
    COALESCE(COUNT(online_users.id), 0) AS users
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(n.name, 'Main') AS node FROM nodes n
) AS nodes
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        u.id,
        IFNULL(n.name, 'Main') AS node
    FROM users u
    LEFT JOIN node_user_usages nuu ON nuu.user_id = u.id
    LEFT JOIN nodes n ON n.id = nuu.node_id
    WHERE u.online_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 SECOND)
      AND DATE(nuu.created_at) = CURDATE()
      AND HOUR(nuu.created_at) = HOUR(NOW())
) AS online_users ON nodes.node = online_users.node
GROUP BY nodes.node;

SELECT b.type 'Client',
       count(a.id) 'Users'
FROM users AS a
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
           sub_last_user_agent,
           CASE 
               WHEN sub_last_user_agent IS NULL OR TRIM(sub_last_user_agent) = '' THEN 'Unknown'  
               ELSE SUBSTR(sub_last_user_agent, 1, INSTR(sub_last_user_agent, '/')-1)
           END AS type
    FROM users
) AS b ON b.sub_last_user_agent = a.sub_last_user_agent
WHERE online_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)
group by b.type

SELECT 
    u.status AS "User Status", 
    COUNT(u.id) AS "User Count"
FROM 
    users u
GROUP BY 
    u.status;

panels.description: حجم کل مصرفی یوزرهای شما (این بخش ریست نخواهد شد)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(used_traffic) >= 1125899906842624 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(used_traffic) / 1125899906842624, 2), ' PB')
    WHEN SUM(used_traffic) >= 1099511627776 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(used_traffic) / 1099511627776, 2), ' TB')
    WHEN SUM(used_traffic) >= 1073741824 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(used_traffic) / 1073741824, 2), ' GB')
    WHEN SUM(used_traffic) >= 1048576 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(used_traffic) / 1048576, 2), ' MB')
    WHEN SUM(used_traffic) >= 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(used_traffic) / 1024, 2), ' KB')
    ELSE CONCAT(SUM(used_traffic), ' B')
  END AS total_used_traffic
FROM users;

panels.title: All Used Traffic Overview

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN downlink >= POWER(1024, 5) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(downlink / POWER(1024, 5), 2), ' PB')
    WHEN downlink >= POWER(1024, 4) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(downlink / POWER(1024, 4), 2), ' TB')
    WHEN downlink >= POWER(1024, 3) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(downlink / POWER(1024, 3), 2), ' GB')
    WHEN downlink >= POWER(1024, 2) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(downlink / POWER(1024, 2), 2), ' MB')
    ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(downlink / 1024, 2), ' KB')
  END AS "Download",

  CASE 
    WHEN uplink >= POWER(1024, 5) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(uplink / POWER(1024, 5), 2), ' PB')
    WHEN uplink >= POWER(1024, 4) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(uplink / POWER(1024, 4), 2), ' TB')
    WHEN uplink >= POWER(1024, 3) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(uplink / POWER(1024, 3), 2), ' GB')
    WHEN uplink >= POWER(1024, 2) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(uplink / POWER(1024, 2), 2), ' MB')
    ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(uplink / 1024, 2), ' KB')
  END AS "Upload"
  
FROM `system`;

panels.description: این قسمت جمع کل حجم های ساخته شده شما هست

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(data_limit) >= 1125899906842624 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(data_limit) / 1125899906842624, 2), ' PB')
    WHEN SUM(data_limit) >= 1099511627776 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(data_limit) / 1099511627776, 2), ' TB')
    WHEN SUM(data_limit) >= 1073741824 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(data_limit) / 1073741824, 2), ' GB')
    WHEN SUM(data_limit) >= 1048576 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(data_limit) / 1048576, 2), ' MB')
    WHEN SUM(data_limit) >= 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(data_limit) / 1024, 2), ' KB')
    ELSE CONCAT(SUM(data_limit), ' B')
  END AS total_data_limit
FROM users;

panels.title: All Data Allocation Overview

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    IFNULL(`n`.`name`, 'Main') AS `Node`,
    SUM(`a`.`used_traffic`) AS `Traffic`
FROM 
    (`node_user_usages` `a` 
    LEFT JOIN `users` `u` ON `u`.`id` = `a`.`user_id`) 
    LEFT JOIN `nodes` `n` ON `n`.`id` = `a`.`node_id`
WHERE 
    CONVERT_TZ(`a`.`created_at`, '+00:00', '+03:30') >= CONCAT(DATE(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), '+00:00', '+03:30')), ' 00:00:00')
GROUP BY 
    IFNULL(`n`.`name`, 'Main');

select a.created_at 'Datetime', sum(a.used_traffic) 'Traffic' from node_user_usages a
join nodes n on n.id = a.node_id
where a.created_at >= concat( curdate(),' 00:00:00')
group by a.created_at
order by a.created_at ASC

select a.created_at 'Datetime', count(a.created_at) from node_user_usages a where a.created_at >= concat( curdate(),' 00:00:00') group by a.created_at 
order by a.created_at ASC

SELECT 
  username as "Name",
  CASE 
    -- WHEN users_usage >= 1099511627776 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(users_usage / 1099511627776, 2), ' TB')
    WHEN users_usage >= 1073741824 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(users_usage / 1073741824, 2), ' GB')
    WHEN users_usage >= 1048576 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(users_usage / 1048576, 2), ' MB')
    ELSE CONCAT(users_usage, ' B')
  END AS "Usage",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE admin_id = admins.id) AS "Users"
FROM 
  admins

panels.description: اطلاعات شما در این بخش (مصرف حجم شما درصورت تمدید ریست خواهد شد)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    ad.username AS 'Admin Name',
    a.reset_at,
    CASE 
        -- WHEN a.used_traffic_at_reset >= POWER(1024, 4) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(a.used_traffic_at_reset / POWER(1024, 4), 2), ' TB')
        WHEN a.used_traffic_at_reset >= POWER(1024, 3) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(a.used_traffic_at_reset / POWER(1024, 3), 2), ' GB')
        WHEN a.used_traffic_at_reset >= POWER(1024, 2) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(a.used_traffic_at_reset / POWER(1024, 2), 2), ' MB')
        ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(a.used_traffic_at_reset / 1024, 2), ' KB')
    END AS 'Used Traffic'
FROM 
    admin_usage_logs a
JOIN 
    admins ad ON a.admin_id = ad.id
ORDER BY 
    a.reset_at DESC;

panels.title: Reseted Traffic

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    users.username AS 'Name',

    CASE
        WHEN used_traffic >= 1099511627776 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(used_traffic / 1099511627776, 2), ' TB')
        WHEN used_traffic >= 1073741824 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(used_traffic / 1073741824, 2), ' GB')
        WHEN used_traffic >= 1048576 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(used_traffic / 1048576, 2), ' MB')
        WHEN used_traffic >= 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(used_traffic / 1024, 2), ' KB')
        ELSE CONCAT(used_traffic, ' B')
    END AS 'Data Used',

    CASE
        WHEN data_limit IS NULL THEN 'Unlimited'
        WHEN data_limit >= 1099511627776 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(data_limit / 1099511627776, 2), ' TB')
        WHEN data_limit >= 1073741824 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(data_limit / 1073741824, 2), ' GB')
        WHEN data_limit >= 1048576 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(data_limit / 1048576, 2), ' MB')
        WHEN data_limit >= 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(data_limit / 1024, 2), ' KB')
        ELSE CONCAT(data_limit, ' B')
    END AS 'Data Limit',

    CASE
        WHEN expire IS NULL THEN 'Unlimited'
        WHEN FROM_UNIXTIME(expire) < NOW() THEN 'Expired'
        ELSE CONCAT(
            FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), FROM_UNIXTIME(expire)) / (60 * 24)), ' Day ',
            MOD(FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), FROM_UNIXTIME(expire)) / 60), 24), ' Hour ',
            MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), FROM_UNIXTIME(expire)), 60), ' Minute'
        )
    END AS 'Expire',

    COALESCE(admins.username, 'Unknown') AS 'Admin Name',
    users.sub_last_user_agent AS 'User Agent'

FROM users
LEFT JOIN admins ON users.admin_id = admins.id

WHERE 
    users.status = 'active' 
    AND users.online_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 SECOND)

ORDER BY users.online_at DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
    n.name AS 'Server Name',
    n.status AS 'Status',
    n.xray_version AS 'Xray Version',
    CASE
        WHEN SUM(u.uplink) < 1024 * 1024 * 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.uplink) / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' MB')
        WHEN SUM(u.uplink) < 1024 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.uplink) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' GB')
        ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.uplink) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' TB')
    END AS 'Total Uplink',
    CASE
        WHEN SUM(u.downlink) < 1024 * 1024 * 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.downlink) / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' MB')
        WHEN SUM(u.downlink) < 1024 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.downlink) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' GB')
        ELSE CONCAT(ROUND(SUM(u.downlink) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2), ' TB')
    END AS 'Total Downlink'
FROM 
    nodes n
LEFT JOIN 
    node_usages u ON n.id = u.node_id
WHERE 
    n.status IN ('error', 'connecting', 'disabled', 'connected')
GROUP BY 
    n.name, n.status, n.xray_version
ORDER BY 
    n.status DESC;

title: Marzban Sudo V2.0.0
